backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Booking type and canister functions to submit bookings (submitBooking) and retrieve all bookings (getAllBookings), storing data in a Map with auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including hero section, about section, services section, booking form, gallery, reviews, contact, and footer with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, styles, and configuration files for the beauty salon website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with rose gold, beige, cream, and charcoal palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for Marisol's Beauty Salon, local keywords, and Google Fonts preconnect for Inter and Playfair Display fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering all sections of the beauty salon website in sequence: hero, about, services, booking, gallery, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying Marisol's professional image, 4.6-star rating with star icons, and descriptive text about salon services and philosophy.
frontend/src/components/BookingForm.tsx: Booking form component with controlled inputs for name, phone, email, service dropdown, date, and time that submits to backend via useSubmitBooking mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying address, click-to-call phone number, business hours in cards, and embedded Google Maps iframe in a two-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright with current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a grid of salon gallery images (transformations and interior shots) with hover effects showing image descriptions.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image, salon tagline, and call-to-action buttons for booking appointments and calling the salon.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsSection.t: Shows customer reviews in a card grid with star ratings and displays an overall 4.6/5 rating based on Google Reviews.
Displays salon services (haircut, coloring, treatments, blow dry, beauty) in cards with images, descriptions, and starting prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting bookings and fetching all bookings from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom rose gold/beige color palette, light/dark mode variables, and utility classes for the salon theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color palette (rose gold, beige, cream, charcoal), typography plugins, container queries, animations, and design tokens using OKLCH color space with CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project state document for Marisol's Beauty Salon website defining architecture (single-page, mobile-first, rose gold/beige palette), existing features (hero, about, services, booking, gallery, reviews, contact sections), and required image assets with dimensions.
